title: A Message from Bobby + BONUS: Velvet's Edge with Kelly Henderson: The Relationship of Your Dreams with psychologist, Joli Hamilton.
itunes:title: A Message from Bobby + BONUS: Velvet's Edge with Kelly Henderson: The Relationship of Your Dreams with psychologist, Joli Hamilton.
description:
Kelly talks to psychologist, author and Ted X speaker, Joli Hamilton about how to get the relationship you want. She addresses trust, jealousy, triggers and owning your side of the street. They also discuss tips for singles on what to do between relationships to make sure your next one is what you want and need. 


Website: jolihamilton.com


Socials: @phoenixjoli 


Book: Project Relationship https://bit.ly/JoliBook


Podcast: https://bit.ly/JoliPodcast

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
